name: serval

a medium-sized African wild cat that has yellow-brown fur with black spots and stripes: The serval is a wild cat sometimes kept as a "designer" domestic pet. Serval cats, ocelots and leopards have spotted coats that camouflage well in dappled light.
More examplesFewer examplesWild adult servals weight 30-45 lbs. and stand about 22-inches tall at the shoulders.Servals have big ears and long, slender legs.Savannah cats are bred from a serval and a domestic cat.We watched serval cats hunting.
